…anti-American propaganda accusing top officials of the  United States Government, including President Trump and the very  appreciated Senate Foreign Affairs Committee Chairman Jim Risch, of  corruption and acting as tools of the deep state.

In fact, just last week, there was a statement by government  officials that Donald Trump was a tool of the deep state.…
